EmailTemplate.name: SaaS Program.Repeat Download Email
EmailTemplate.subject: SaaS Activation Email
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest in a VMTurbo. Our records indicate that you have already activated a SaaS instance of VMTurbo Operations Manager. If you wish to extend your trial or our records are wrong, please contact evalTeam@vmturbo.com <mailto:evalTeam@vmturbo.com>
Best regards,
- The VMTurbo Team
